eu.play_project.play_platformservices

Class PlayPlatformservicesRest

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.play_project.play_platformservices.PlayPlatformservicesRest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryDispatchApi

    @Singleton
public class PlayPlatformservicesRest
extends Object
implements QueryDispatchApi
    The PLAY REST Web Service to manage event patterns. See PlayPlatformservices for the corresponding SOAP service.

      • analyseQuery

        public QueryDetails analyseQuery(String queryId,
                        String queryString)
                          throws QueryDispatchException
        Description copied from interface: QueryDispatchApi
        To get details about a query. This operation does not register the query and can be used to do checks on the query before registering.
        Specified by:
        analyseQuery in interface QueryDispatchApi
        Throws:
        QueryDispatchException - if the query contains errors

      • registerQuery

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response registerQuery(String queryString)
                                        throws QueryDispatchException
        A setter only available in REST service (not SOAP PlayPlatformservices) to add an anonymous query without ID. Creates a new random UUID for the child-resource (new query) and creates the resource.
        Returns:
        Response.Status.CREATED including the newly created HttpHeaders.LOCATION header.
        Throws:
        QueryDispatchException

      • registerQuery

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response registerQuery(Query query)
                                        throws QueryDispatchException
        A setter only available in REST service (not SOAP PlayPlatformservices) to add an anonymous query without ID. Creates a new random UUID for the child-resource (new query) and creates the resource.
        Returns:
        Response.Status.CREATED including the newly created HttpHeaders.LOCATION header.
        Throws:
        QueryDispatchException
